articles.author: Jen Christensen
articles.title: Doctors are ignoring new federal vaccine recommendations - abc7.com
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics on Monday released its updated recommendations for what vaccines children should get.
articles.content:
The American Academy of Pediatrics on Monday released its updated recommendations for what vaccines children should get.
It's a routine revision, hardly different from last year's recommendations, b… [+7014 chars]
